description: brown hard bound book that resembles wicker with dirty white cover padded with brown felt; cover is secured with ink stained tulle tape; pages contain various colored abstract brush strokes and splatters; images of nature and swans are printed over some of colored pages; lender's archive #194
medium: Watercolor, gouache, ink, and graphite; bound volume
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
title: Mein Schwan
